headline: Ask HN: Create GitHub Issue Right from Slack/Discord/MS Teams/etc.?
description:
I've been looking for such a tool for a few months now.

I'd like to be able to select a Slack message, for example, and create a GitHub issue out of it. This would automate a lot of boring work for me and my team. I'm at the point of writing it myself but rather would use someone else's service.

Do you happen to know a tool like this?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 从Slack/Discord/MS Teams/etc.直接创建GitHub问题？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 從Slack/Discord/MS Teams/etc.直接創建GitHub問題？
description_zh-Hans:
我寻找这样的工具已经有几个月了。

我希望能够选择一条Slack消息，比如说，并从中创建一个GitHub问题。这将使我和我的团队的许多无聊工作自动化。我正准备自己编写，但更愿意使用别人的服务。

你是否碰巧知道有这样的工具？
